overview: The 1st one-man live of virtual singer KOKO, who debuted from KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO in October 2020, has been decided!  She has created "connections" with fan users through her own music, such as the user-participation type MV project "player", and this time, no one knows what kind of stage and world view she will show at the 1st one-man live.
title: Koko 1st ONE-MAN LIVE "PLAYER"
